identity.title: First appearance in array (with fixed start)

content.prompt: Complete the following method which takes the following parameters (in this order):- an array of integers arr,- an integer count,- an integer startingAt,- and an integer key,the method has to return the index where the integer key appears for the first time starting to count from position startingAt and considering only the count next elements in the array. In case the integer key does not appear in the fixed range of the array, the method must return -1. For example:indOfFirst( {1,2,3,4,5,6} , 2 , 3 , 3 ) => -1indOfFirst( {1,2,4,3,5,7} , 2 , 3 , 3 ) => 3indOfFirst( {3,2}, 1 , 0 , 3 ) => 0

uses.used_by: Jordan Barria, Jordan Barria - University Of Pittsburgh

uses.context_name: Java: LabsCMPINF401 | Wentworth COMP1050 Labs > Arrays/ArrayLists/LinkedLists
